subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: The two goalies, Antero Nittymaki of the Flyers and Henrik Lundqvist, staged a classic shootout battle, each stopping 12 shots in a row before Lundqvist made one final save and Marcel Hossa finally scored for the Rangers.
snippet: The two goalies, Antero Nittymaki of the Flyers and Henrik Lundqvist, staged a classic shootout battle, each stopping 12 shots in a row before Lundqvist made one final save and Marcel Hossa finally scored for the Rangers.
